channel.title: CVE Feed for NEC Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NEC Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39546|2023-11-24T11:49:51.705Z -- nec%20corporation -- clusterpro%20x%20%28expresscluster%20x%29
item.description: CLUSTERPRO X Ver5.1 and earlier and EXPRESSCLUSTER X 5.1 and earlier, CLUSTERPRO X SingleServerSafe 5.1 and earlier, EXPRESSCLUSTER X SingleServerSafe 5.1 and earlier allows a attacker to log in to the product may execute an arbitrary command.

item.title: CVE-2023-39547|2023-11-24T11:50:37.452Z -- nec%20corporation -- clusterpro%20x%20%28expresscluster%20x%29
item.description: CLUSTERPRO X Ver5.1 and earlier and EXPRESSCLUSTER X 5.1 and earlier, CLUSTERPRO X SingleServerSafe 5.1 and earlier, EXPRESSCLUSTER X SingleServerSafe 5.1 and earlier allows a attacker to log in to the product may execute an arbitrary command.

item.title: CVE-2023-39341|2023-08-09T02:42:51.631Z -- nec%20corporation -- actsecure%20%CF%87
item.description: "FFRI yarai", "FFRI yarai Home and Business Edition" and their OEM products handle exceptional conditions improperly, which may lead to denial-of-service (DoS) condition. Affected products and versions are as follows: FFRI yarai versions 3.4.0 to 3.4.6 and 3.5.0, FFRI yarai Home and Business Edition version 1.4.0, InfoTrace Mark II Malware Protection (Mark II Zerona) versions 3.0.1 to 3.2.2, Zerona / Zerona PLUS versions 3.2.32 to 3.2.36, ActSecure χ versions 3.4.0 to 3.4.6 and 3.5.0, Dual Safe Powered by FFRI yarai version 1.4.1, EDR Plus Pack (Bundled FFRI yarai versions 3.4.0 to 3.4.6 and 3.5.0), and EDR Plus Pack Cloud (Bundled FFRI yarai versions 3.4.0 to 3.4.6 and 3.5.0).

item.description: CLUSTERPRO X Ver5.1 and earlier and EXPRESSCLUSTER X 5.1 and earlier, CLUSTERPRO X SingleServerSafe 5.1 and earlier, EXPRESSCLUSTER X SingleServerSafe 5.1 and earlier allows a attacker to log in to the product may execute an arbitrary command.

item.title: CVE-2023-25011|2023-02-15T00:00:00 -- nec%20corporation -- pc%20settings%20tool
item.description: PC settings tool Ver10.1.26.0 and earlier, PC settings tool Ver11.0.22.0 and earlier allows a attacker to write to the registry as administrator privileges with standard user privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-3331|2023-07-03T02:10:13.150Z -- nec%20corporation -- aterm%20wg2600hp2
item.description:
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory vulnerability in NEC Corporation Aterm Aterm WG2600HP2, WG2600HP, WG2200HP, WG1800HP2, WG1800HP, WG1400HP, WG600HP, WG300HP, WF300HP, WR9500N, WR9300N, WR8750N, WR8700N, WR8600N, WR8370N, WR8175N and WR8170N all versions allows a attacker to delete
specific files in the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-3330|2023-08-28T00:56:00.401Z -- nec%20corporation -- aterm%20wg2600hp2
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory vulnerability in NEC Corporation Aterm WG2600HP2, WG2600HP, WG2200HP, WG1800HP2, WG1800HP, WG1400HP, WG600HP, WG300HP, WF300HP, WR9500N, WR9300N, WR8750N, WR8700N, WR8600N, WR8370N, WR8175N and WR8170N all versions allows a attacker to obtain specific files in the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-3333|2023-07-03T02:11:31.242Z -- nec%20corporation -- aterm%20wg2600hp2
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command vulnerability in NEC Corporation Aterm WG2600HP2, WG2600HP, WG2200HP, WG1800HP2, WG1800HP, WG1400HP, WG600HP, WG300HP, WF300HP, WR9500N, WR9300N, WR8750N, WR8700N, WR8600N, WR8370N, WR8175N and WR8170N all versions allows a attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command with the root privilege, after obtaining a high privilege exploiting CVE-2023-3330 and CVE-2023-3331 vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2023-3332|2023-07-03T02:10:55.668Z -- nec%20corporation -- aterm%20wg2600hp2
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability in NEC Corporation Aterm Aterm WG2600HP2, WG2600HP, WG2200HP, WG1800HP2, WG1800HP, WG1400HP, WG600HP, WG300HP, WF300HP, WR9500N, WR9300N, WR8750N, WR8700N, WR8600N, WR8370N, WR8175N and WR8170N all versions allows a attacker to
execute an arbitrary script, after obtaining a high privilege exploiting CVE-2023-3330 and CVE-2023-3331 vulnerabilities.
